channel.title: Does Silent Mouse still work? And Another Question
channel.description:
i just want to bot on a Private server that doesnt have good anti protections, how can i make a simple autoclicker that clicks on colors?? just want to make something that clicks on INCREDIBLY simple colors, but i cant find it anywhere :( help? ( if you could post a script for that and explain how to use it and how it works then id be really gratful.) ( im a newbie to SCAR scripting :| ) Thanks for your time!
EDIT: Working on the bit of script bebo gave to start off, hoping to make shitloads of variations of this lol,( really simple as only for private servers ) :D heres the code
Thanks alot! [code]Procedure FindAndClick; begin if(FindColor(var x, y: Integer; color, xs, ys, xe, ye: Integer))then clickmouse(x , y , true) end;[/code]
Bebe, i know you made that awsome tutorial on bitmaps, but how do i find coordinates for my own scripts?? i know that when u click on a color with the color picker it gives you some coordiantes but what about this bit of script: [code](FindColor(var x, y: Integer; color, xs, ys, xe, ye: Integer))then[/code] what do i put in the xs ys xe ye inger sections? and im assuiming that i put the color code after color? :o thanks for your help im quite new, any tutorials for mouse moving and clicking? or would i just replace the find color with a findbitmap??

item.title: Does Silent Mouse still work? And Another Question
item.dc:creator: @R3volution1 R3volution`
item.description:
@R3volution1 wrote:

dragx55:

Silent Mouse doesn’t work for me in private servers :(. When I use it the my mouse just moves to the bottom left corner of my screen and doesn’t do anything.

Bebe:

As far as I know silent mouse stopped working a long time ago and was removed from Scar Divi by Freddy1990.

nice…

Read full topic

item.title: Does Silent Mouse still work? And Another Question
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Silent mouse would still work fine, it was just unsafe to use on RS2. Since Scar is supposed to be for multiple games, no idea why Freddy would remove it.

item.description:
@cows1471 wrote:

[quote=“tilduer, post:3, topic:309505”]thanks dude, ive used a simple mouse-recording script, ( made by me =D) but it still has screen shifting, so i click off it after like 1 hour lol, wake next morning 2 find my acc in barb village, but wont get banned (doesnt have any banning features execpt normal player report lol.)

Thanks alot! ill work on this script =D and i read your tutorials bebe, the are HEAPS helpful, explained coding in plain english too me. thanks![/quote]
shes not a dude

item.source: Does Silent Mouse still work? And Another Question

item.title: Does Silent Mouse still work? And Another Question
item.dc:creator: @Bebemycat2 Bebe
item.description:
@Bebemycat2 wrote:

As far as I know silent mouse stopped working a long time ago and was removed from Scar Divi by Freddy1990.

Well since this is for a private server there is no need to script it very well for the simple fact you aren’t going to be banned for using it most likely

Simple color clicker outline:

Procedure FindAndClick; begin if(FindColor(var x, y: Integer; color, xs, ys, xe, ye: Integer))then clickmouse(x , y , true) end;
That should get you started. If you need further help the take a visit to the tutorial section or visit SRL (I recommend).

Read full topic
item.source: Does Silent Mouse still work? And Another Question
